long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A beautiful To-Do List extension that helps keep you stay organized and on top of your priorities. 

Add items to your To-Do List by typing them into the textarea. Once you've completed the item simply press the green checkmark. Simple as that! 

If you want to leave feedback or want new designs simply email me at toshvelaga@gmail.com

Enjoy! :)
